fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • In an article about bonuses we said that the housebuilding company Persimmon did not operate in south-east England. While most of the firm’s business is outside of this area, it does have a small number of projects in Kent, Sussex and Surrey (Bonus row will reach boiling point in new year, 16 December, page 2). • Other recently corrected articles include: ‘Drugs are too expensive for the NHS – and people are paying with their lives’ New book to give insider view of ‘nasty daily clashes’ at Trump’s volatile White House Polish up your pecs: women prefer strong men, say scientists
